ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.  At 30+ it becomes a waste of time.  But now im lvl 15 and have lvl 30+ stuff and 4k banked.  I have an int bag, charisma bag, resistance bag, mana
ygData.messageBody:
I agree. At 30+ it becomes a waste of time. But now im lvl 15 and have lvl
30+ stuff and 4k banked. I have an int bag, charisma bag, resistance bag,
mana and hp bag, and a misc bag. I think its a huge advantage to be able to
raise your stats so high so early in your life.
-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 4:15 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Latest nerf


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

>Ya know, you'd be a great debater..... hehehe. it takes me about 4 hours
of
>running around to get all the components for the quest. I figure 75pp an
>hour is better then camping a spawn for hours to get something that you
>could buy.

well, i guess at lvl 12 it's worth it, sure. but at lvl 39, id rather kill
midgets and make 400pp an hour =)

>
>A little spin off here: I don't know about anyone else but I hate camping
>for stuff. It always turns into a screaming match with other players about
>who stole what and im reporting you or so and so is gay. I'd much rather
>wander out in the open areas and hunt stuff for exp then fight over spawns.
>But, on the flip side...theres nothing like looting a good item yourself
>instead of buying it. I remember when I looted my first savents camp. I
>was so excited. :)
>

i absolutely hate camping items, but a lot of the stuff i need nowadays
costs way too much and id rather camp it. i feel bad for warriors, most of
their good stuff is no drop =/
-------------------
tim borrelli
lead character animator
"I dont suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it..."
Volition, Inc.
timmyland@...
